ai-patthana23.37:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana23.37:1.1_0: Not reciting a thought with the teaching, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana23.37:1.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana23.37:2.1_0: Not by reciting a teaching, there is no cause or condition for unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana23.37:2.1_1: or excessive teaching. Skillfulness is a condition for unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana23.37:2.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana23.37:3.1_1: or he hasn’t declared his teaching because of extremely lack of reason.
ai-patthana23.37:3.1_2: This is the cause of two reasons:
ai-patthana23.37:3.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
